title: Full Trailer for Marvel's 'What If…?' Series - Season 3 with Hulk & More
description: "This is the shot we have. We may not get another one... Let's finish it." Ready? Marvel has dropped the new official trailer for the latest season of What If...?, their fun anthology series taking crazy all-out "what if" imaginative looks at different characters and ideas in the MCU. This might be the final season because Marvel's own intro from YouTube states: "Witness the season that ends it all." The Watcher even comes out and says this, too. The first season launched in 2021 to mixed reviews, and this second season debuted in late 2023 one year ago. The opening once again is: Welcome back to the multiverse. So much to see in these 8 episodes! The voice cast set for Season 3 includes Jeffrey Wright as The Watcher, once again, along with Sebastian Stan as Bucky Barnes, David Harbour as Red Guardian, Laurence Fishburne as Goliath, Oscar Isaac as Moon Knight, Simu Liu as Xu Shang-Chi, Kathryn Hahn as Agatha Harkness, Anthony Mackie as Sam Wilson / Cap, Hailee Steinfeld as Kate Bishop, Hayley Atwell as Captain Carter. Plus a few other surprises, of course. Looks like it has a rad Gundam style Avengers segment. Up for an adventure? […]
author: Alex Billington
excerpt: "This is the shot we have. We may not get another one... Let's finish it." Ready? Marvel has dropped the new official trailer for the latest season of What If...?, their fun anthology series taking crazy all-out "what if" imaginative looks at different characters and ideas in the MCU. This might be the final season
text: by November 11, 2024Source: YouTube "This is the shot we have. We may not get another one... Let's finish it." Ready? Marvel has dropped the new official trailer for the latest season of What If...?, their fun anthology series taking crazy all-out "what if" imaginative looks at different characters and ideas in the MCU. This might be the final season because Marvel's own intro from YouTube states: "Witness the season that ends it all." The Watcher even comes out and says this, too. The first season launched in 2021 to mixed reviews, and this second season debuted in late 2023 one year ago. The opening once again is: Welcome back to the multiverse. So much to see in these 8 episodes! The voice cast set for Season 3 includes Jeffrey Wright as The Watcher, once again, along with Sebastian Stan as Bucky Barnes, David Harbour as Red Guardian, Laurence Fishburne as Goliath, Oscar Isaac as Moon Knight, Simu Liu as Xu Shang-Chi, Kathryn Hahn as Agatha Harkness, Anthony Mackie as Sam Wilson / Cap, Hailee Steinfeld as Kate Bishop, Hayley Atwell as Captain Carter. Plus a few other surprises, of course. Looks like it has a rad Gundam style Avengers segment. Up for an adventure? Here's the full official trailer (+ poster) for Marvel's What If? - Season 3, direct from Marvel's YouTube: Season 3 follows classic characters as they make unexpected choices that will mutate their worlds into spectacular alternate versions of the MCU. The Watcher (voice of Jeffrey Wright) will guide viewers as the series traverses new genres, bigger spectacles, and many incredible new characters. With an incredible voice cast that includes a host of stars who reprise their iconic roles. Season 3 also features fan-favorite characters like Captain America/Sam Wilson, The Winter Soldier/Bucky Barnes, Hulk/Bruce Banner, The Red Guardian, Captain Peggy Carter, Agatha Harkness, Shang-Chi, Storm the Goddess of Thunder, and numerous others. What If...? Season 3 features episodes that are once again directed by executive producer Bryan Andrews, also of the "Men in Black: The Series" and "Jackie Chan Adventures". Other episodes are directed by Stephan Franck. AC Bradley also returns as the head writer on the series, with other writers including Ryan Little and Matthew Chauncey. It's executive produced by Kevin Feige, Brad Winderbaum, Louis D'Esposito, Dana Vasquez-Eberhardt, and Bryan Andrews. Disney will debut this next What If...? - Season 3 streaming on Disney+ starting December 22nd, 2024 coming soon. Who wants to watch this? Find more posts: Marvel, Streaming, To Watch, Trailer
html:
by
November 11, 2024
Source: YouTube

"This is the shot we have. We may not get another one... Let's finish it." Ready? Marvel has dropped the new official trailer for the latest season of What If...?, their fun anthology series taking crazy all-out "what if" imaginative looks at different characters and ideas in the MCU. This might be the final season because Marvel's own intro from YouTube states: "Witness the season that ends it all." The Watcher even comes out and says this, too. The first season launched in 2021 to mixed reviews, and this second season debuted in late 2023 one year ago. The opening once again is: Welcome back to the multiverse. So much to see in these 8 episodes! The voice cast set for Season 3 includes Jeffrey Wright as The Watcher, once again, along with Sebastian Stan as Bucky Barnes, David Harbour as Red Guardian, Laurence Fishburne as Goliath, Oscar Isaac as Moon Knight, Simu Liu as Xu Shang-Chi, Kathryn Hahn as Agatha Harkness, Anthony Mackie as Sam Wilson / Cap, Hailee Steinfeld as Kate Bishop, Hayley Atwell as Captain Carter. Plus a few other surprises, of course. Looks like it has a rad Gundam style Avengers segment. Up for an adventure?

Here's the full official trailer (+ poster) for Marvel's What If? - Season 3, direct from Marvel's YouTube:

Season 3 follows classic characters as they make unexpected choices that will mutate their worlds into spectacular alternate versions of the MCU. The Watcher (voice of Jeffrey Wright) will guide viewers as the series traverses new genres, bigger spectacles, and many incredible new characters. With an incredible voice cast that includes a host of stars who reprise their iconic roles. Season 3 also features fan-favorite characters like Captain America/Sam Wilson, The Winter Soldier/Bucky Barnes, Hulk/Bruce Banner, The Red Guardian, Captain Peggy Carter, Agatha Harkness, Shang-Chi, Storm the Goddess of Thunder, and numerous others. What If...? Season 3 features episodes that are once again directed by executive producer Bryan Andrews, also of the "Men in Black: The Series" and "Jackie Chan Adventures". Other episodes are directed by Stephan Franck. AC Bradley also returns as the head writer on the series, with other writers including Ryan Little and Matthew Chauncey. It's executive produced by Kevin Feige, Brad Winderbaum, Louis D'Esposito, Dana Vasquez-Eberhardt, and Bryan Andrews. Disney will debut this next What If...? - Season 3 streaming on Disney+ starting December 22nd, 2024 coming soon. Who wants to watch this?

Find more posts: Marvel, Streaming, To Watch, Trailer
